summary: Adds more variety to the existing spells.  Feel free to add suggestions and feedback :)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#208020]Added new variety to Skyrim's spells. No new effects, i just expanded on the existing spells.[/color]

[size=4][color=#6060c0][u]Gameplay Changes:[/u][/color][/size]

[color=#208020]I've added the bulk of the spells now (Around 170 - 200 spells), I just have to properly balance it all now.

Added new variety to Skyrim's spells.  No new effects, i just expanded on the existing spells.  I've also reduced the cost of dual casting cost multiplier from 2.8x to 2.1x to make it more viable to use.

Daedric Artifacts no longer use enchantment charges, basically giving them infinite use.

Potent Atronachs are now level 40 instead of 35.  Vampire Lords can still activate things.

Khajitt and Vampire Nighteye spells last as long as Thrall spells now, the nighteye shader has been altered to be a bit more clear.

Vampire Absorb Health spell for the player has been changed to match the NPC version of it.  now a vampire the same lvel as you won't drain faster than you.

Spells have been re-named to be better sorted (Spells I made have and any spells related to them)[/color]

[size=4][color=#6060c0][u]New/Changed Spells:[/u][/color][/size]

[color=#208020]Summon Skeletal Warrior (Conjuration Novice)
Summon Skeletal Archer (Conjuration Novice)

Summon Flame Atronach - Lesser (Conjuration Apprentice)
Summon Flame Atronach (Conjuration Adept)
Summon Flame Atronach - Greater (Conjuration Expert)

Summon Frost Atronach - Lesser (Conjuration Apprentice)
Summon Frost Atronach (Conjuration Adept)
Summon Frost Atronach - Greater (Conjuration Expert)

Summon Storm Atronach - Lesser (Conjuration Apprentice)
Summon Storm Atronach (Conjuration Adept)
Summon Storm Atronach - Greater (Conjuration Expert)

Summon Draugr Archer (Conjuration Apprentice)
Summon Draugr Warrior (Conjuration Apprentice)
Summon Draugr Warlock (Conjuration Apprentice)

Summon Draugr Wight Archer (Conjuration Adept)
Summon Draugr Wight Warrior (Conjuration Adept)
Summon Draugr Wight Warlock (Conjuration Adept)

Summon Draugr Scourge Archer (Conjuration Expert)
Summon Draugr Scourge Warrior (Conjuration Expert)
Summon Draugr Scourge Warlock (Conjuration Expert)

Summon Draugr Deathlord Archer (Conjuration Master)
Summon Draugr Deathlord Warlock (Conjuration Master)
Summon Dremora Thrall (Conjuration Master) (Was previously Deathlord Warrior)

Healing Hands (A version for each mastery level)
Healing (A version for each mastery level)
Fast Healing (A version for each mastery level)
Heal Other (A version for each mastery level)

Magetorch (Larger Radius Magelight) (Alteration Adept)
Lamplight (Larger Radius Candlelight)  (Alteration Apprentice)
Moonlight (Brighter Lamplight) (Alteration Adept)
Thaumlight (Larger Radius Moonlight) (Alteration Expert)
Sunlight (Brighter Thaumlight) (Alteration Master)

Nighteye (Illuison Novice)
Nighteye (Illuison Apprentice)
Nighteye (Illuison Adept)
Nighteye (Illuison Expert)
Muffle Other (Illusion Adept)
Fade Other (Illusion Master)
Calm/Fury/Fear/Courage (A version for each mastery level)

Sparks (A version for each mastery level)
Flames (A version for each mastery level)
Frostbite (A version for each mastery level)

Firebolt (A version for each mastery level)
Ice Spike (A version for each mastery level)
Lightning Bolt (A version for each mastery level)

Fireball (A version for each mastery level)
Chain Lightning (A version for each mastery level)
Ice Storm (A version for each mastery level)

Flame Cloak (A version for each mastery level)
Frost Cloak (A version for each mastery level)
Shock Cloak (A version for each mastery level)

Flame Rune (A version for each mastery level)
Frost Rune (A version for each mastery level)
Shock Rune (A version for each mastery level)

These can be found at merchant who sell these level/type of spell normally.[/color]
author: StewB

files.name: Magic Reworked - old
files.changelogHtml:
Daedric artifats don\'t use charges
deathlord warrior changed to dremora thrall
Nightvision imagespace modifier change to be easier to see/less blue
new illusion spells - Muffle other, Fade other and Nighteye
